name: European Confederation of Agronomists Associations
goal: CEDIA is the network for national associations of Agricultural Scientists and Engineers in a number of European Countries. We are committed to cooperation in education, research, advice and development with regard to strategies for sustainable agriculture, food production, environmental protection, food safety, community policy, rural development and professional development.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Education and training, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, International co-operation and development, Regional Policy, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: Agriculture, Qualifications Directive, Rural Development, CAP, Sustainable Development, Research and Innovation, Food Safety
